msbt.message: For realsies? Live on this island Yeah! I could jive with that!I mean, any island with you on it is for sure to be fun!I'll go ask Resident Services if there's somewhere for me to live, !

Hmmmmthat IS a super-tempting offer. You know whatI said no before, but this time I'm going to say YES! I will SO totally move here. I mean, my fans need me! Now I just have to go show my fab face over at Resident Services and make sure they give this plan a like.
Huh?! Ohmigosh! To this island?! That could be pretty coolButI'm sorry, I just can't. I've got friends waiting for me back home. Thanks for the invite, though!

Huh?! Ohmigosh! Move?! To this island?!II can't. I have my dance-practice besties back on my island and I can't just abandon them, you know? So I'm going to pass on the whole moving adventure Thanks for the invite, though!

Say what! You're inviting me?! To move?! Here?! Ohmigosh I'm SO sorry, but I have to pass. My house is finally clean. I know that sounds like a totes weird excuse, but I've been living there for two years and I just can't even deal with organizing a house all over again. Maybe another time, .
Huh?! I can move here?! That'd be low-key way coolbut I'm not sure.<10_4 /> Here's an idea! Let's play a game!If you win, I'll move here! What do you say, ?
OK!
No, thanks.
Huh? Ohmigosh! To this island?! Ooh, , that could be fab, but I need to think about itHow about this?! We'll play a game. If you win, I move here! Am I totes a genius or what?!
Bring it on!
I'll pass.

Ohmigosh! Moving here would be awesome, fab, super, and WOW all at onceit'd be awefabsuperwowtastic!Buuutyou don't get my celebrity presence that easily. We're going to play a game!If you win, I'll move here. Easy as that. Sound good?
I'll win for sure!
Never mind, then.
Whaaat, you don't want to? Ugh fiiine, !
Whaaat?! I thought you'd be down for a game like that, !
Whaaat! It's your chance to get a future pop star on your island, 'K? Think of the tourism Bells!
Alright, time for a card game, then! Guess what's on the card I'm about to draw, !
I won! Sorry, but I won't be moving.
I win! I won't be filling your island with super celeb sparkly light, and that's a downer, I know.
Looks like I win. Sorry, I won't be moving here, .
I may not be moving this time, but I'll probs write a hit song about our little game, so thanks for the inspo!
That was a super fun game. Maybe we'll get the chance to play again some other day, .
I think we'll always remember the time we spent playing that game Especially you, once I'm famous.
Ohmigosh, you win! That means I'm moving to !I'm TOTES excited to define the celebrity scene here!Oh! Hold up! I almost forgot! I gotta go ask Resident Services if I can even, like, live here first.

OHMIGOSH! You win! I'm moving! I lost the game, but won an island! OK, I didn't "win" an island, butHow married are you to the name ? How's ville sound?town? port? Isla de la ?Oh! Hmm Give that a good think while I go ask Resident Services if I have permission to live here. I was sooo excited about my big move I nearly forgot a few important deets! Be right back!

I lost? Yes! I lost! My plan worked! I'm moving to !My plan? WellI had to get you to ask me to move so we could play a game that I'd trick you into winningThen I'd have a funny story about how I moved here. Celebrities need funny stories to tell on talk showsNow THIS is my funny talk-show story! THANK YOU!Oh! Oh right! I totes gotta ask Resident Services if I can even live here! Hold tight while my story takes a little unexpected turn, .

It's the worst news. The LEGIT worst!<10_4 /> Totes legit THE WORST NEWS!<10_4 /> I talked to Resident ServicesAnd they said even if I move here, there's no room for me to build my houseI need my house, ! I do dance practice in my house. And other stuff too. Like watch TV!Resident Services did say if there's someone who's thinking of moving away, I could have their spotDo you know of anyone? I hope, ?
I do!
Nope...
Oh well. I guess it was a long shot I guess I'll just give up on my dream of living anywhere cool

I have to decidedo I go, "This island ain't big enough for the two of us"? Or do I go, "I'm famous. Do what I say"?Resident Services said these peeps are super nice, but it's always good to prepare, !
So it's right, ?
Yup.
Oops, made a mistake.
Actually, never mind.
OK! Here we go. I'm off to ask. Wish me luck, !
Are you thinking of someone else? Tell me who and I'll go ask.
Aww, are you sure? OK, maybe some other time, .

I asked like you told me toand agreed! said this island totes needs a famous musician, but too busy to do it 's moving away, and I'll be moving here super SUPER soon!Anyhoo, I guess this means it's time for my favorite partintroductions!I'm ! And you're , right?Well, I have a sense for these things, and my senses are saying this is going to be sensational!
You don't have anyone in mind after all, ?
There is!
I totally forgot who.
OK! Tell me who I should go ask!
Aww. I was all excited about this Well, maybe some other time!
Yay! Of course you do! Is it? I bet it's . I mean, Resident Services might have mentioned name to me while I was over there. So, like, would it be OK if I talked to about moving out?
Totally!
Please don't.

Oh, uhOK. That's a big NOPE from you, I guess.I'm a little blue, but whatevs. It's like they say When one stage door closes, another stage door opens. Somewhere, somehow, I'm going to make my big entrance, !

Well, I chatted with the folks at Resident Services, and I've got bad news is full. There's no room for me, even though I explained that I'm pretty small. And adorable.Ugh This is the worst! Maybe we'll find another way to be neighbors someday, .

Thanks for waiting! I asked the Resident Services hereand they said I'm welcome! Guess that means I need to start packing pronto. Oh! I guess that also means it's introduction time! So, you're , right? Well, I'm , your new favorite neighbor, !
Oh, butshould I maybe go ask Resident Services one more time? Just in case?I want to live here SO MUCH, I COULD IMPLODE!
Go try again!
You should give it up.
You're right! They said no can do, and I need to accept that. Like an adult. Who isn't going to cry Aw, it's OK to cry when you need to. And I need to, !

Your island is POPPING if they have so many residents they can't accept any more. I may not be able to move here now, but I'll def come here on tour once I'm a pop star!With so many folks living here, it'll for sure have a huge crowd! Buy your tickets now, !
Totally great things keep happening when I'm camping on this island! I'm, like, sooo happy right now! I vibe with this island really well. I low-key don't ever want to go home, .
Want to live here?
Glad you like it here.
For realsies? I'd be down!But I need to pass. I've got a metric ton of glitter back home, and that stuff is tr√®s pricey to ship.But maybe I'll be able to move here some other time, ?
I totes do! If I had more free time, I'd visit over and over again!
Let me hit you with some real talk. Being on is so much fun it's legit incredible.The vibe here is great, and the folks I've met here are even greater!
Want to live here?
Glad you like it here.
I was JUST thinking about how fab moving here would be<10_4 />but I really can't. Not right now, at least. I've got a lot going on back home, but I might be up for a move if I come visit again, !
I've been having SO much fun, I might just come visit again!
